ModMetaData.name: Prisoner Restraints Upgraded
ModMetaData.author: celphcs30
ModMetaData.description:
Unbreakable prisoners? Unwaveringly loyal captives? Not anymore. Prisoner Restraints introduces new methods to break down resistance and a progression system that can make unwaveringly loyal prisoners recruitable.
Features: - Restraining table: Immobilizes prisoners and slowly reduces resistance - Humiliation cage: Strips dignity and apparel, moderate resistance reduction - Sensory collapser: High-intensity deprivation chamber for unwaveringly loyal prisoners - Chemfuel bath: Expedited resistance reduction through chemical burns
Vanilla Nutrient Paste Expanded Support: All restraint beds can now accept the nutrient paste dripper facility. Place a dripper adjacent to the bed head to automatically feed prisoners via the paste network.
Vanilla Chemfuel Expanded Support: The chemfuel bath can now be connected to the chemfuel pipe network for automatic refueling.
Release System: Prisoners can be manually released from any restraint device using the "Release prisoner" button. Wardens will automatically remove restraints and free the prisoner, allowing them to move normally.
Original mod by SilkCircuit. Forked and updated for RimWorld 1.6 by celphcs30.
